content:
/>
Introduction
This topic contains information about rating decisions for COVID-19, including
definition of COVID-19
use of the COVID-19 special issue indicator
active vs. acute COVID-19
residuals of COVID-19
delayed onset of COVID-19 residuals
disabilities resulting from COVID-19 vaccination
hospitalization and convalescent ratings for COVID-19 residuals
, and
applicable theories of SC for COVID-19 residuals
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 3 - Infectious Diseases, Immune Disorders, and Nutritional Deficiencies
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 3, Section None
